price: Allah sigurno zna tajne nebesa i Zemlje, On dobro zna sve što grudi kriju.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha ʿālimu ghaybi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
